name: Rapoji
description:
See why the new music rhythm game is so addictive!

Unlock game levels just with your skills!
Win all the rounds and become King of Kings!
Take your chance and share your winning dance!
Attention: Level 65 is a Killer! Only the best can play masterpieces like Moonlight sonata.

■ Description ■

New creative way for active music listening. Listen to the songs and swipe your fingers to the rhythm. Catchy music from booming Rap, Trap, Beatbox and Rock to the vibe piano.
Rapoji game is designed with the simplicity and flexibility in mind, using advanced audio engine to make your experience amazing. Check it out! Rapoji is really COOL app!

■ How to play ■

• Like RapNinja, smash the flying beat cubes with the swipe gestures to the rhythm of the music. After the cube´s color change, swipe in the arrow direction.
• If you win enough scores, you win the round and face the next challenge of your 65 game levels
• Personalize and share your winning stickman dance

■ Features ■

+ New creative way for active music listening
+ Enhanced sound space with the stereo audio engine
+ Listen and chillout over 65 epic game levels :: YEAH!
+ Different rhythm over the Rap, Trap, Beatbox and Rock to the classical piano
+ Adrenalizing tempo from 50 to 160 BPM
+ Funny stickman dance animations (BreakDance, Shuffle, Floss, HeadBanger, Twerk, Belly, Gangman style ...)
+ Share your viral winning cards on the most popular social networks like TikTok, WhatsApp , Instagram, Messenger, and many more
+ Beautiful graphics :: !WOW!
+ Simple control :: YES!!!

+ No Cellular Data required to play
+ It´s totally FREE!, no further downloads or installs required
+ No pay to play or pay to win
+ Unlock all the levels just with your skills!

■ Privacy ■

+ Feel secure about your privacy
+ All processing is done locally on your device
+ We never upload or look at your photos

Heyyy! Are you ready!?
Feel the groove, make you move! :: COOL!
Come and hit the catchy beat!
Have a Great Fun!

■ Just one more thing ■

We´re working hard to bring you future FREE updates!
Don´t forget to rate us on app store. It´s really helpfull to serve you better app.
Please also feel free to contact us at email:
RapojiApp@gmail.com
Any feedback or suggestion will be welcome.
